item.description:
Cradles To Crayons is an organization that caters to the needs of underprivileged children in the Boston area by providing them with books, bags, clothes, toys etc. Its efforts are highly appreciated for enabling access of the needy to high value and high quality services without any political agendas. For volunteers, it offers a casual yet appreciative atmosphere to contribute meaningfully to the immediately local community.

Our task as volunteers would be to sort through and pack various items in their warehouse (like books/bags/etc) for easy dispatch to individual children. This would take roughly 3 hours. No prior experience or repeat commitment necessary.

Donations (both cash and kind) are welcome, but not required.

Info: http://cradlestocrayo...
Reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...
item.name: Cradles To Crayons
